conversation.content: I want a heartfelt sports movie
Do you prefer stories focused more on romance or the sports action itself?
I’m really into emotional love stories set in sports worlds.

You should check out *For Love of the Game*! It’s a touching baseball drama about a legend trying to win both the game and his true love’s heart ❤️⚾🎬. Kevin Costner really brings the emotion and passion to life!
